title: Lodging Reservation
description: Collects all details specific to a lodging reservation.

xdm:agentID.title: Agent ID
xdm:agentID.description: Agent ID associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:averageDailyPrice.title: Average Daily Price
xdm:averageDailyPrice.description: Average daily price of the hotel room.

xdm:basePrice.title: Base Price
xdm:basePrice.description: Base price before any discounts are added.

xdm:bookingID.title: Booking ID
xdm:bookingID.description: Booking ID associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:checkInDate.title: Check-In Date
xdm:checkInDate.description: The check-in date of the for the room reservation.

xdm:checkOutDate.title: Check-Out Date
xdm:checkOutDate.description: The check-out date of the for the room reservation.

xdm:couponCode.title: Coupon Code
xdm:couponCode.description: Coupon code associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:discountPercent.title: Discount Percent
xdm:discountPercent.description: Discount percentage associated with the booking.

xdm:freeCancelation.title: Free Cancelation
xdm:freeCancelation.description: Yes/no if the room has a free cancellation.

xdm:guestID.title: Guest ID
xdm:guestID.description: Guest ID associated with the hotel booking.

xdm:loyaltyID.title: Loyalty ID
xdm:loyaltyID.description: Includes the loyalty/rewards program ID for the passenger listed in the reservation.

xdm:numberOfRooms.title: Number of Rooms
xdm:numberOfRooms.description: Captures the number of rooms associated with the reservation.

xdm:propertyID.title: Property ID
xdm:propertyID.description: Identifier of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

xdm:propertyName.title: Property Name
xdm:propertyName.description: Name of the hotel/resort for the reservation.

xdm:ratePlan.title: Rate Plan
xdm:ratePlan.description: The rate deal on which the room was sold.

xdm:refundable.title: Refundable
xdm:refundable.description: Yes/no if the room is refundable.

xdm:roomAccessibilityType.title: Room Accessibility Type
xdm:roomAccessibilityType.description: Type of accessible room, such as mobility, hearing, or other.

xdm:roomCapacity.title: Room Capacity
xdm:roomCapacity.description: Number of people the hotel room holds.

xdm:roomType.title: Room Type
xdm:roomType.description: Captures the type of room being reserved.

xdm:smoking.title: Smoking
xdm:smoking.description: Yes/no if the room allows smoking.

xdm:cancellation.title: Cancellation
xdm:cancellation.description: Tracked when a reservation has been cancelled.

xdm:created.title: Created
xdm:created.description: Tracked when a reservation has been created.

xdm:currencyCode.title: Currency Code
xdm:currencyCode.description: Currency code used to make the purchase. ISO 4217 currency code.

xdm:length.title: Length
xdm:length.description: Tracks the total number of days for a reservation.

xdm:modification.title: Modification
xdm:modification.description: Captured when a reservation has been modified.

xdm:modificationDate.title: Modification Date
xdm:modificationDate.description: Tracks when a reservation has been modified.

xdm:numberOfAdults.title: Number of Adults
xdm:numberOfAdults.description: Captures the number of adults associated with the reservation.

xdm:numberOfChildren.title: Number of Children
xdm:numberOfChildren.description: Captures the number of children associated with the reservation.

xdm:purpose.title: Purpose
xdm:purpose.description: Tracks the purpose of the reservation, typically either business or personal.

xdm:tripType.title: Trip Type
xdm:tripType.description: Indicates if the reservation is for a one way, round trip, or multi-city.

xdm:lodgingCheckIn.description: Lodging check in details such as room selection as well as start, save, failure and complete of check in.

xdm:userSelectedRoom.title: Guest Selected Room
xdm:userSelectedRoom.description: Captures if the guest selected their room at check in.

xdm:oneRoomCheckIn.title: One Room Check In
xdm:oneRoomCheckIn.description: Captured upon completion of check in when there is only one room available at that time.

xdm:noRoomCheckIn.title: No Room Check In
xdm:noRoomCheckIn.description: Captured upon completion of check in when there is only one room available at that time.

xdm:digitalKey.title: Digital Key Selected
xdm:digitalKey.description: Tracks when a user selects the use of a digital key upon check in.

xdm:lateCheckInRequested.title: Late Check In Requested
xdm:lateCheckInRequested.description: Tracks when a user requests a check in later than normal check in hours.

xdm:earlyCheckInRequested.title: Early Check In Requested
xdm:earlyCheckInRequested.description: Tracks when a user requests a check in earlier than normal check in hours.

xdm:rackrate.title: Rack Rate
xdm:rackrate.description: Cost for the same day reservation without prior booking arrangements.

xdm:roomKeys.title: Room Keys
xdm:roomKeys.description: Captures the number of standard room keys provided at check in.
